alert.note: Alert for Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Cheyenne (Southeastern Wyoming and Western Nebraska)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 09 at 8:28PM MDT by NWS Cheyenne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of central Converse County through 915 PM MDT... At 828 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 9 miles east of Rolling Hills, or 19 miles northwest of Douglas, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Douglas around 855 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 25 in Wyoming between mile markers 131 and 157. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until midnight MDT for east central Wyoming.

area.areaDesc: Converse County Lower Elevations; North Laramie Range
